title: StreamOutBehavior
content:
This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.
To submit a bug report on the content, see
https://devforum.roblox.com/c/bug-reports/documentation-issues/72

name: StreamOutBehavior
type: enum
summary: |
  Determines how content is streamed away from Players.
description: |
  Determines how content is streamed out from Player clients. This is a
  temporary rollout API. In the future, streaming will always run on
  Opportunistic mode.
codesamples: []
tags: []
deprecationmessage: ''
items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      Currently equivalent to LowMemory. This will eventually change to
      Opportunistic.
    value: 0
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: LowMemory
    summary: |
      Only stream out when memory is low.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: Opportunistic
    summary: |
      Stream out content that is significantly outside of the current
      StreamingRadius.
    value: 2
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
